UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Piscidin-1-analogs with double L- and D-lysine residues exhibited different conformations in lipopolysaccharide but comparable anti-endotoxin activities.
Literature.Author: Kumar A, Mahajan M, Awasthi B, Tandon A, Harioudh MK, Shree S, Singh PK, Shukla PK, Ramachandran R, Mitra K, Bhattacharjya S, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=200 µM
